title: Condensed Brody-esque sans The Remodel Shop logo
content:
I need help I cant find this font

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828002210im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/TheRemodelShop11b_5484.gif)

 [‹ (x) Slab serif fashion brand names - Egizio {Jekdahl}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828002210/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42668 "Go to previous forum topic") [Base font suggestion for this "Ilk" logo ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828002210/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42658 "Go to next forum topic")
author: aldgraphics

comments.content:
I think this reminds me a lot of Image Club [Badloc](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828002210/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.htm?pid=405816&grab_id=0&page_id=13607&query=Badloc&SCOPE=Fonts). Some of those Image Club designs were based on other typefaces, but that is the closest I can suggest offhand.

- Mike Yanega

Looks similar to Industria by Neville Brody:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/industria/solid/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828002210/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/industria/solid/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/industria/solid/")

The E and M are not the same.

There was a font called Bedrock that shipped with Corel Draw 8 - I’m assuming it’s the same as Badloc.

- Lex
